newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Remedy EPS, rating raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Remedy EPS, rating raised.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist raised its rating on shares of Remedy Corp to strong buy from buy after the company completed its 1997 planning with a "very positive outlook on all fronts."

-- Hambrecht & Quist also raised its 1996 earnings estimate to $0.95 a share on revenues of $74.7 million from $0.91 a share on revenue of $73.5 million. It raised the company's 1997 estimate to $1.44 a share on revenue of $121.5 million from $1.10 a share on revenue of $105 million.
-- The investment firm expects growth from large account wins and repeat business, product uptake in the Windows NT market and new opportunities overseas, especially in Asia.
